bos arjuna eekedi kiyanne eyage hadawatha kamathi lankawa dinanawata eeth tharagaya 50-50 kiyala.miniha kiyapu eka waradi naha kiyala mach ekedi theruna neda?krikat kiyanne bos gem ekak.eeka me maranthika deshapremi yuddhayak karaganna oone naha.ada ude indiyanu chanal ekakadi hitapu indiya kridakayo – uda – nawjoth sin sidu – lankawe hoda kiyanawa mama dakka.kandayamaka kridashilithwaya agaya karanna hari tharagayak gana thamange adahasa palakaranna hari rata badhawak karaganna oone naha.arjunata hithenawa nam tharagaya 50-50 kiyala eeka kiyana eke waradda mokakda?methana wenne arjuna wipakshaye nisa minihata mada gahana deshapalana konthraththuwak.waruni amunugamage deranata nikamatawath oyita wada ithama naraka padanamak nathi mahinda abesundarage pajatha kathawa gana mukuth segmant ekak danna bari wuna neda?munge kapati deshapalana gatawalata ahuwena oyala wage babala dakiddi apita nam hina
